articles.author: Josh Taylor
articles.title: Google's Bard AI chatbot launches in Australia with vow to develop it ethically - The Guardian
articles.description: Company says its AI programs will include watermarks and metadata identifying AI-generated content as ChatGPT rival rolls out in more than 180 countries
articles.content:
Googles AI chatbot Bard launched for Australian users on Thursday as the company showcased its advancements in artificial intelligence and pledged to roll out the technology ethically.
Until now, Ba… [+7820 chars]
